stripped_text: Play only if there is no active lockdown. This operation is not trashed until your next turn begins. As an additional cost to steal an agenda, the Runner must pay 4 credits, plus 2 credits for each advancement token on that agenda.
text: Play only if there is no active lockdown. This operation is not trashed until your next turn begins. As an additional cost to steal an agenda, the Runner must pay 4[credit], plus 2[credit] for each advancement token on that agenda.
title: NAPD Cordon
